Description:
Sale By Set Date – 2/10/2018 at 6pm
Located in an ever-popular pocket of Clyde North in Berwick Waters on a sweeping private drive is this wonderful near new home ready and waiting for you. This stunning double storey home offers three bedrooms and two separate living areas across a clever floor plan. Upon entering the property you'll note that an open plan kitchen, meals and living area allows plenty of room for family, friends and entertaining.
The kitchen hosts a generous pantry along with stainless steel appliances and stone benchtops with plenty of storage space. Outside to the rear of the property a covered alfresco overlooks manicured gardens ensuring low-maintenance living all year round. Coming back inside and heading upstairs you'll note three generous bedrooms, master with ensuite and walk-in-robe alongside a central bathroom and a generous family room with built-in study nook. Comforts and conveniences include ducted heating and cooling, internal access, fully landscaped gardens & powder room downstairs. Location is superb offering easy access to local schools, shops and the M1 freeway.
The property is currently leased until 8th March 2019 at a rate of $1,733 per calendar month. Whether you're looking for a great investment return or to establish yourself in a great area be sure to call today to register your interest, as opportunities such as this do not last long!
Insights: 25 Elmtree Crescent, Clyde North VIC 3978 was last sold in 2018 and 69 other 3 bedroom house in Clyde North have recently been sold.

Description:
FANTASTIC OPPORTUNITY IN CLYDE NORTH!
Situated in the exclusive Cascades on Clyde estate sits this impeccable family residence complete with a great sized master with walk in robes and full en suite!
The hostess kitchen is a chef's dream and is complete with quality stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher, 600mm range hood and a 4-burner cook top, tiled splash back, ample cupboard/storage options, all this and a whole lot more overlooking the separate meals and rear living zone.
Those who like to entertain are bound to enjoy the multitude of separate living areas on offer. There is enough space for the entire family to enjoy!
Added extras include: ducted heating, two separate split systems for cooling, paved driveway, neutral tones throughout, low maintenance gardens, internal access plus much more!
This is a tremendous opportunity for a family who insists on nothing but the best! Surrounded by top end properties the location is second to none and is within walking distance to picturesque wetlands.
Other estate features include Class-A recycled water ensuring lush gardens year round, over 14 hectares of parkland and public open space, public BBQ facilities, playgrounds and walking tracks. Those who are business savvy will appreciate this Telstra smart community positioned within a short drive to all amenities located in the townships of Berwick, Clyde and Cranbourne.
Minutes away from Freeway access en route to the Melbourne CBD, the popular Clyde Primary School, Casey Fields football ground/Casey Race aquatic centre, not to mention walking distance from the Selandra rise shopping centre!
BOOK AN INSPECTION TODAY, IT MAY BE GONE TOMORROW! - *PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS*

Description:
The Mont Clare
Look no further than the Mont Clare for an immersive home experience which blends high end functionality with glamour and grandeur for the ultimate dream home. With a luxury master suite, a total of four bedrooms and two large living zones, comfort is certainly at the heart of the Mont Clare design. High end living just got that little bit higher.
Overview:
4 Bedrooms, master with en-suite and walk in robe
Remaining bedrooms with built in robes
Provincial style kitchen with butler's pantry with Neolith stone benchtops
European oak timber flooring
Fireplace
Wine cellar
Lounge room
Study
Open plan living, meals & family room
Alfresco
Double garage
Fully landscaped
Other inclusions:
Alarm system, window furnishings, timber floors, exposed aggregate driveway and paths.

Description:
400m2 Titled Block "Meridian Estate" Ready to Build.
Be quick to secure this titled parcel of land in this highly desirable family location. The block is surrounded by new, quality-built homes, all of grand proportions.
This sensational block is also conveniently located within a few minutes' drive to Eden Rise and close to Berwick Waters Lake. It is accessible to the Monash Freeway, ensuring easy access to Melbourne's CBD in one direction.
Invest Confidence:
Eden Rise Shopping Centre is approximately 5 minutes' drive from the property
Berwick and Merinda park train station is approximately 10 minutes' drive from the property
Monash Freeway & Casey hospital approximately 10 minutes' drive from the property
Alkira Secondary College is approximately 2.08 km away from the property
- 400m2
- 12.5m front x 32m (approx.) depth
Walk to
- Parks & Wetland Reserve
- Purposed primary school
- Monash Freeway & Casey Hospital
- Berwick & Merinda Park Train Stations
- Hillcrest & Riverchrest College

Description:
AN EXQUISITE Family HOME facing Heritage Gardens in Selandra Rise!!
Presenting to you this gorgeous Henley home that exudes style and space. Offering a low maintenance lifestyle with room that all of the family will appreciate, all that you need to do is move in and enjoy life.
It begins with the fully landscaped front yard, clever lighting and steps that lead you to the feature front door that makes for an incredible entry. Once inside, wooden floorboards takes you past the master bedroom to the open plan family/meals, formal lounge with a cozy fireplace. The stunning stone topped and stainless steel equipped kitchen provides easy access to the separate meals zone and adjoining fully fitted theatre room.
This beautiful house includes:
* 4 Bedrooms with W.I.R to Master with remaining Bedrooms all with double B.I.R's
* Full ensuite to Master with double basins, extra-large shower and bath tub
* High ceilings and Downlights
* Wooden flooring
* Theatre room and a study
* Double remote control Garage with extra space
* Security cameras
* Ducted Heating and evaporative cooling
* Open floor plan with feature stunning kitchen including dishwasher
* Perfectly positioned undercover alfresco entertaining area complete with built in BBQ
Major amenities within proximity:
* Selandra Rise shopping centre and Pasadena shopping centre are approx. 2 minutes' drive away from the house
* Access to public transport approx. 2 minutes' drive away from the house with bus routes to * Berwick & Cranbourne Stations
* St. Thomas the Apostle Primary School is approx. 2 minutes' drive away from the house
* St. Peters Secondary College is approximately about 2 minutes' drive away from the house
* Casey Fields is approx. 5 minutes' drive away from the house
* Casey Race, YMCA Gym/Pool & Library are located approx. 5 minutes' drive away from house
* Within walking distance to bike paths, playgrounds, parks, sports facilities & community vegetable garden
* Located close to many restaurants & cafes in the surrounding areas
Nestled in a family friendly neighbourhood within walking distance to reputable schools both primary and secondary, all this and only minutes away from the centre of Berwick and Cranbourne and access to the Monash freeway. A home that radiates charm and character, be sure to inspect before it's too late.
Don't miss this once in a while opportunity therefore you must call " Vipin on 0452 510 707 " now to inspect what this beauty of a home has to offer you.
DISCLAIMER: All stated dimensions are approximate only. Particulars given are for general information only and do not constitute any representation on the part of the vendor or agent.
Please see the below link for an up-to-date copy of the Due Diligence Check List: http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist
Photo ID is a must.

Description:
No Body Corporate! Separate Title Town Homes with Park Frontage! 30 SQUARES !
This is a rare opportunity to own a park facing spacious & Luxurious home in the most sought-after area in Clyde North
Located in KiloraPark estate, next to future Minter Farm Berwick and Circa Estate, these Town Homes have everything a modern family hope for
These homes come with large master bedroom with walkin robes & ensuite (double vanity & double shower with tile shower base), three more spacious bedrooms, modern kitchen with large island benchtop, glass flashback, walkin pantry, 900mm stainless steel appliances, multiple living zones and a private backyard
Your new home luxury inclusions:
- Designer kitchen with Caesarstone grand island benchtop
- Luxury 900mm European style stainless steel appliances
- Convenient walk-in pantry
- Quality carpet and quality timber look-flooring throughout
- Luxury basins and deluxe tapware
- Driveway, path and fencing
- Convenient remote control garage door
- Contemporary landscaped
- 50 year structural warranty
- Great land size
- Recycle water on tap
- Fast NBN internet speed though-out estate
These homes are located walking distance from Hillcrest Christian College & Rivercrest Christian College and future Berwick Water Town Center
Private inspections welcome. Call to obtain directions.
Pictures are for illustration purposes only.

Description:
Live the good life in Cascades
Found in the exclusive Cascades on Clyde Estate, this young three bedroom home offers generous living space as well as a convenient lifestyle. On approximately 400m2, there is literally nothing to do but move in and enjoy the beautiful entertaining space and contemporary style with your family.
Comprising of:
- Light filled Master bedroom with WIR and en-suite featuring oversized shower and twin vanity.
- Two more generous bedrooms both with built in robes.
- Luxurious open plan living area PLUS a separate formal lounge for those movie nights in.
- Well-appointed kitchen with quality s/s appliances, Teckina 900mm oven with 5 burner cooktop, dishwasher, 40mm Caesarstone benches plus a walk in pantry and breakfast bar.
- For those who entertain you'll love the cornerless bi-fold doors that open up onto a large decked alfresco - seamlessly blending together both inside and outside living.
- Generous backyard for kids and pets to play.
- Other features include: Ducted heating, downlights throughout, low maintenance gardens, double garage with internal access to the home plus loads, loads more..
This stunning home is ideally located close to parklands and bus services, easy access to schools such as Cranbourne East Primary and Secondary schools and just a 12 minute walk to Selandra Rise Shopping Centre with 24/7 Gym. You'll also find at the end of the street a great children's playground, beautiful wetlands and walking tracks to enjoy with your family. The perfect choice for those looking for your first home or an immaculate investment!

Description:
The Big Entertainer
Situated in the prestigious Cascades on Clyde estate sits this impeccable family residence. This tremendous and highly sort after estate has lots to offer including beautiful wetlands, easy access to Selandra Rise shops which includes: Safeway, Cafes, Takeaway Food Shops as well as a Dog park, Lots of walking tracks, Bus stop, Childcare Centre, Gym, Schools and much more.
The master bedroom is a standout for this home as it gives buyers so much space for kings and queens, which is serviced with a massive His & Her walk in robe and full ensuite. The other three large bedrooms are serviced by the main bathroom with separate toilet giving parents their own privacy.
The massive theatre room is perfect for those cosy nights in to watch your favourite movies and with the creature comforts of ducted heating and evaporative cooling that will be made easy.
The second living area is serviced by the generous kitchen with massive walk-in-pantry, complete with 900mm gas cooktop, stainless steel appliances, including dishwasher, ample cupboards and an island bench with plenty of bench space to prep for your next dinner or kids birthday party, it overlooks the meals area. This light filled space is further complimented by an alfresco area with a water feature which is accessed through glass sliding doors, so your family can really spread out and enjoy what this property really has to offer.
Ease is a word that jumps to mind as you won't have to lift a finger as this home is ready and waiting for you to arrive. You'll have everything you could need with loads of space left over! Be sure to inspect. Call Vikram on 0430392918 or Ajay on 0403351577 for more information.

One Separate living zones one with a lounge/rumpus & expansive open-plan family/dining, kitchen with 900mm appliances, stone-bench with glass splashback. This property is a convenient located close to schools, and other amenities like, Future Ramlegh Springs Shopping Town, Future Kingswim aquatic centre and Future YMCA. In a short drive you can reach to Clyde Shopping centre(Coles,Mc donalds,Restaturent), Berwick Town centre , Monash freeway access , Casey Hospital, Berwick Hospital, Beaconsfield train station, Cranbourne train station, Future Cranbourne East Train Station and close to some popular Schools such as St Thomas The Apostle Primary School, Wilandra rise primay school( Selandra rise estate) and St Peters College, Cranbourne East Primary School and Cranbourne East Secondary School, St Francis Xavier College Berwick Campus, Hillcrest Christian College, Berwick Chase Primary School

Description:
SOLD BY BRANDON WHITTA!
Located in the Cascades on Clyde estate sits this Porter Davis 31.74sq(approx) family built home, situated on a generous sized 512m2 block!
Upon entry you will be immediately impressed, with a keen eye for detail this home has spared no expense. Four bedrooms plus study, the generous sized master comes complete with a big walk in robe, full en-suite that includes dual vanities and an extended shower space.
The hostess kitchen is a chef's dream and is complete with quality stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher, 900mm range hood, 5-burner gas cook top, caesar stone bench tops, glass splash back, ample overhead storage and bench space plus a walk in pantry. All of this overlooking your separate meals and living zone.
Not only is this home fitted out with top quality fixtures and fittings it also presents a grand capacity to accommodate even the largest of families, this is truly an entertainers delight with multiple living zones on offer including an enormous enclosed theatre!
Additional extras include: ducted heating & evaporative cooling, split system in master bedroom, down lights throughout, neutral tones, extended double garage space, exposed aggregate driveway plus much more!
The additions don't stop there, step through the sliding doors and enjoy your well-appointed alfresco area complete with decking and an extended pergola! This provides the perfect setting to sit back and relax after the long working week or to entertain friends and family!
Surrounded by top end properties and is within walking distance to picturesque wetlands, this home boasts convenience. Other estate features include Class- A recycled water ensuring lush gardens year round, over 14 hectares of parkland and public open space, public BBQ facilities, playgrounds and walking tracks.
Those who are business savvy will appreciate this Telstra smart community positioned within a short drive to all amenities located in the townships of Berwick, Clyde and Cranbourne. Minutes away from freeway access enroute to the Melbourne CBD, the popular Clyde Primary School, Casey Fields football ground/Casey Race aquatic centre and the Town Centre. Not to mention just minutes away from the Selanda rise and hunt Club village shopping centres.
From front to back this home was completed with an exceptional eye for detail and will be the perfect residence for those that expect nothing but the best!

Description:
COSY, HOMESTYLE LIVING IN SELANDRA RISE
CLYDE NORTH: Step inside this beautiful home and you will greeted with a sense of warmth which will immediately make you fall in love.
Comprising of 3 spacious bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, single car garage, open plan living and a courtyard, this home offers the perfect opportunity for young couples, families or investors alike. Laminated floorboards throughout and a neutral colour palette, further add to appeal of this home.
The kitchen will also not disappoint with a 40mm stone bench top,900mm cooktop and oven and a dishwasher.
Situated in the thriving Selandra Rise Estate in Clyde North, you will be able to enjoy the many benefits of living in an area which is well established. Walking trails and playgrounds for the little ones to explore add to the attractiveness of the estate, which also provides access to a variety of local amenities including schools and recreational facilities. With the Community Hub recently opened a medical centre and veterinary clinic also due to open in the coming months, this estate offers everything you could ask for.
With so much to offer, this is definitely an opportunity not to be missed!
Summary of added internal and external features include:
- Built in 2014 by 8 Homes
- Master bedroom with FES & WIR
- Laminated floorboards
- High ceiling
- Air conditioner
- 40mm Ceaser stone kitchen benchtop
- Built in pantry
- 900 mm oven
- 900 mm gas cook top
- Sub tiled splash back
- Dishwasher
- Overhead cupboards
- Large fridge space
- Stainless steel range hood
- Ducted heating
- Court yard
- Internal & external access from the garage
- Side access
- Fully secure backyard
Major amenities close by:
* Selandra Rise shopping centre is about three minutes' drive away from the house
* Pasadena shopping centre is approximately five-minute drive away from the house
* Bus stop is approximately two minutes' drive away from the house
* Berwick and Cranbourne railway stations are approximately 15 minutes' drive away
* St Thomas the apostle primary school is approximately five minutes' drive away from the house
* St. Peters secondary collage is approximately about five minutes' drive away from the house
* Casey Fields is approximately ten minutes' drive away from the house
* The Casey Complex & Casey RACE are approximately ten minutes' drive away from the house
* Easy access to Berwick-Cranbourne road

Description:
Superior Package!
Situated in the ever growing Selandra Rise Estate is this spectacular four-bedroom home. Complimented by a quality modern interior and external finishing's, this home is the perfect place to enjoy luxury living within such a convenient location.
As you walk in you will be pleasantly surprised by the colour tones, quality fittings, fixtures and the floor plan. The heart of this home is the incredibly impressive and tastefully designed kitchen with stones bench tops, oversized island, 900mm stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, and excellent amount of cupboard and bench space with walk-in pantry. Beyond the kitchen, you will find the family living / dining area which has all the space required for easy entertaining.
This home comprises a large master bedroom complete with a walk in robe and ensuite with a lovely double vanity and private toilet, whilst the remaining three bedrooms are generously proportioned and complemented by built in robes and the stylish family bathroom.
In addition, enjoy the undercover alfresco and large deck area perfect for entertaining family and friends.
Selandra Rise is designed around open outdoor areas creating an innovative, greener lifestyle. A uniquely planned community, this terrific estate will cater to your every need. The grand plan features a town centre with supermarket, retail and community centres, health and childcare services, with local employment and aged care facilities close by. You will have no trouble in creating the perfect work-life balance with the multiple playgrounds catering for all children's ages, interconnected walking/bike tracks and sporting grounds!

Description:
LUXURY HOUSE ! MOVE IN NOW !
Absolutely stunning in looks, be prepared to fall in love with this contemporary residence estate. These brand new homes have all the classic Henley Luxury inclusions, backed by it's premium location, adjacent to Berwick.
Built by reputed Henley, with 50 year structural warranty and fantastic after settlement support service, this home is ready for you to call Home.
Step into this beautifully presented 4 bed room property and you will know that this is the one. With spacious master bedroom with en-suite (double vanity, spectacular sized shower & WIR), 1 separate bathroom and 2 spacious living areas, alfresco, remote control Double lock up garage.
Being built to luxurious and high standards that are unmatched, this home will not only offer the lifestyle of your dreams but be the envy of all others that step into it. With all upgraded extras that are added on you will be investing in prestige and style of the highest degree.
with Caesar stone grand island benchtop ( Luxury 900mm European style stainless steel appliances), Convenient walk-in butlers pantry, Quality carpet in all bedrooms and timber look flooring in living areas and pantry., Luxury basins and deluxe tapware, Resort style stacker sliding doors
This property is located close to St Xavier, Hillcrest Secondary College, Monash University, Eden Rise Shopping Centre, Berwick shops and train station and close & has easy access to Monash Freeway.
Land sizes 400sqm with different floor plans available. Pictures are for illustration purposes only. Call to inspect these luxurious homes and make your dreams come true.
Moreover, if you are a first home buyer, you may be legible to receive the $10,000 First Home Owner's Government Grant.
You only pay 5% deposit now and remaining on the settlement.
Call Rinaldi on 0422 054 137

Description:
First Home Buyers, Check This Out!
Located in the highly sought after Selandra Rise Estate, Clyde North, presents an amazing opportunity that is sure not to be missed. This modern, light filled home is the perfect start for a small family or a savvy investor looking to get their foot into the market place.
On offer are 3 well sized bedrooms, master with en-suite and walk in robe, with the remaining 2 bedrooms having built in robes. There is ducted heating and fans throughout the home with multiple split systems included.
The open plan living with kitchen/dining adjoined includes a large breakfast island bench providing an open feel for the home. The kitchen includes ample cupboard space, dishwasher and stainless steel appliances.
Some features of this home include remote car garage, tiling throughout, an open veranda and a shed in the backyard.
With only a stone throw away from all main amenities, the location is second to none and is sure to impress on many fronts. Some local amenities include Selandra Rise Shopping Centre, Clyde Shopping Centre, Casey Grammar, St. Thomas Apostle Primary School, St. Peters Secondary College, Casey Fields Sporting Complex, Casey RACE and many bus stops and parks.
Be quick to inspect and call Kevin Port-Louis now for your private viewing.

Fall in love with the charm, character and ease of this captivating premium built and immaculately presented home only 3 years old. Set in facing open playground in the heart of Salandra rise. Stone's through away from Woolworth, schools & public transport.
Get creative with this Luxurious and Spacious kitchen equipped with stainless steel appliances, modern island design with stone bench top, tempered splashback and ample storage, separate living, highly functional open-plan living zone that welcomes in plenty of natural light. The carpeted bedroom enjoys the benefits of a vast window pleasantly overlooking the grass area, as well as built-in robes. The laundry incorporated in the bathroom.
In a perennially area. Investors and those looking to get into the market are bound to be impressed by the immense lifestyle appeal. cafes, restaurants, shops, supermarkets and boutiques. This excellent lifestyle can be yours in one of Melbournes most sought-after locations.

Description:
Contemporary Class
Designed by streamlined interiors and its sleek contemporary impression, this home is a conveniently positioned base to easily access the lifestyle allure Clyde North has to offer. Proudly presented with effortless style is this brand new home loaded with top of the range luxury inclusions built by Henley in one of the most desired estates in Clyde North, ‘Berwick Waters’. High-end, fashionable and functional, this world of luxury is yours for the taking. Master suite includes spacious walk-in robe and ensuite with extended shower, double vanity plus private toilet. Three further spacious and fitted bedrooms (1 x BIR, 2 x WIR’s). Cook up a storm courtesy of a stainless steel Smeg cooker with a 5-burner gas cooktop framed in soft-close cabinetry. Enjoy, entertain, and live high in style but low on maintenance, this sun-drenched residence will excite the senses. Slide the doors open in summer and dine alfresco on the northerly-facing covered deck while children play on the grassed area. A separate laundry room leading directly to the clothesline outside adds a functional touch for busy families. Additional appointments include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, two car remote garage just to name a few. Walk to Hillcrest College and zip to nearby parklands, Eden Rise Village, St Catherine’s Primary School and much more!
